text: The J.M. Smucker Company is an American manufacturer of food and beverage products. It was founded in 1897 as a maker of apple butter. It is headquartered in Orrville, Ohio. currently has three major business units: consumer foods, pet foods, and coffee. Its flagship brand produces fruit preserves, peanut butter, syrups, frozen crustless sandwiches, and ice cream toppings. Category:American food companies Category:1897 establishments in the United States
title: The J.M. Smucker Company
